channel.title: golang on Lteman's Website
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Lteman's Website

item.title: 升级Ubuntu 18.4 的golang版本
item.description: 1，删除旧版本的golang # apt-get remove golang-go # apt-get remove --auto-remove golang-go # apt-get purge --auto-remove golang-go 2，安装最新的golang1.14 # add-apt-repository ppa:longsleep/golang-backports # apt update # apt install golang-go # go version go version go1.

item.title: Ubuntu更新最新Golang版本
item.description: Ubuntu升级golang 1.12 更新golang版本 add-apt-repository ppa:longsleep/golang-backports apt-get update apt-get install golang-go apt install golang-golang-x-tools rm -rf /etc/apt/sources.list.d/longsleep-ubuntu-golang-backports-xenial.list 检查安装golang版本 # go version go version go1.
